version_description:
We update the Stylish Text app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the
latest update:

- Bug fixes and improved performance.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Stylish Text engine running.

 Have a question? Tap Help in the Stylish Text app or visit https://stylishtext.app/

Thanks for using Stylish Text!

We update the Stylish Text app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the
latest update:

- Bug fixes and improved performance.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Stylish Text engine running.

 Have a question? Tap Help in the Stylish Text app or visit https://stylishtext.app/

Thanks for using Stylish Text!

We update the Stylish Text app regularly to make it faster and more stable for you.

Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:
* Added new styles in text and numbers.
* Added 60 new decorative art styles.
* Now edit the text on details page as well.
* Now open the app directly from the keyboard.
* Added Dark and Black UI themes.
* Now you can reorder your favourite styles.
* Added colourful themes in Keyboard.
* Now you can write text quickly using SIRI.
* New app icon, splash and video tutorial.
* Fixed bugs and improved performance.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us keeps running the Stylish Text application.

Have a question? Tap Help in the Stylish Text app or visit https://stylishtext.app/contact-us/

Thanks for using Stylish Text!

We update the Stylish Text app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Added numbers Styles in Keyboard app.
- Bug fixes and improved performance of the Stylish Keyboard app and Stylish Text app.
- User can changed the Keyboard app theme form the application.


Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Stylish Text engine running.
